text: Yes, I also have this problem.
Marketplace theme reviews are not being pulled. <@U01AS49TB0T> <@U02094DEMTK>
<@UBZ8C6DTK> could you clarify on what you're referring to here?
Hey Everyone, we're working on a fix for this now. Its looking like we'll see this resolved Monday, but I'm pushing for a quicker resolution.
I'll post an update here as soon as I have one regarding the white screen issue.

If you've recently reported a review left on a marketplace theme/module, please know that it _can_ take up to 10 days for it to be actioned. This is outlined in our knowledge base here: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/resources/ratings-and-reviews-template-marketplace#how-can-i-delete-a-review-or-ask-HubSpot-to-remove-a-review:~:text=once%20a%20review%20or%20a%20reply%20is%20reported%2C%20it%20will%20be%20reviewed%20by%20the%20HubSpot%20team%20within%2010%20business%20days>.
This should be resolved, but let me know if you're still able to reproduce

There are 9 of us so far who plan to discuss the idea of a “MyFirst”App” cohort, to create, launch & scale HubSpot Public apps to the first milestone of 100 active Installs. (You have to beat 800+ other apps just to get to 100). When we have around 12-16 people interested, we’ll jump on a call to talk it through. If you know someone who is a good fit for something like this, please direct them to: <https://marketplace.hubdo.com/en-US/apps/428352/my-first-HubSpot-app-(beta-cohort)>
